title: Bug 15899 - 'Close all saved' does not work all the time
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu does not close all the saved editors. 

To reproduce:
1. Create a new file named f1.txt.
2. Select the 'Close All Saved' option from the file menu.

Expected Behavior (EB):
All the open editors, including the saved ones, should be closed.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the application with build 20020508 and the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. From the file menu, select the 'Close All Saved' option.

Note: This issue occurs intermittently and does not work all the time.
